description: Primes p such that 86 is not a square mod p.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
prog: (MAGMA) [ p: p in PrimesUpTo(433) | not IsSquare(R! 86) where R:= ResidueClassRing(p) ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 10 2012
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Offset changed from 0 to 1 by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 10 2012
